revised_title: Meteorological and Seismological Observations in India and a Blackbird's Behavior
tldr: This issue of the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London presents meteorological observations from six stations in India, reports from mining registrars, and various scientific findings. Among them, Rev. L. Blomefield shares further results of meteorological observations at the Bath Royal Literary and Scientific Institution, T. Gray discusses an improved seismograph, and Sir J. B. Laws shares memoranda of field and laboratory experiments conducted at Rothamsted.
